sentences.en: He is the music talented person, this is indubitable.
sentences.cn: 他是个音乐才子, 这是无可置疑的.

sentences.en: His brilliance renders this film an indubitable classic.
sentences.cn: 他的出色表现让这部电影成为了毋庸置疑的经典。

sentences.en: It is indubitable that at the arrival of each fresh Fosyte child he was quite upset.
sentences.cn: 每次福尔赛家有一房添丁进口的时候,他都要不开心一阵,这总是无可争辩的.

sentences.en: It is indubitable that good region advantage and good investment environment are playing important role.
sentences.cn: 毋庸置疑,苏州良好的区位优势和良好投资环境是吸引外资流入的重要因素.

sentences.en: Now, you must agree that these are indubitable symptoms of insanity.
sentences.cn: 我想您也得承认,这些无可争辩的事实都是脑力衰弱的象征.

sentences.en: The growth of the whole market is indubitable as expectancy.
sentences.cn: 整个市场的成长不如预期是无可置疑的.

sentences.en: The indubitable evidence we produced bore down our opponents in the debate.
sentences.cn: 我们在辩论中提出的不容置疑的证据,击败了对方.

words.tran_cn: 无疑地，不容置疑地，不容置疑地

trans.tran_cn: 不容置疑的，明确无疑的，无可置疑
trans.tran_en: You use indubitable to describe something when you want to emphasize that it is definite and cannot be doubted
